name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】かなたそとっ♡神曲アニソンFes!! ⧸ Amane Kanata AnimeSong 3DLIVE 【#天音かなた爆誕2024 ⧸ ホロライブ】 [lVQlIvUr5Dc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'only my railgun' by Amane Kanata and Shiranui Flare.
Interlude with stage transformation from a resort setting to a darker, more dramatic aesthetic.
Performance of the song 'Kaibutsu' (Monster) by Amane Kanata, Shiranui Flare, and Houshou Marine.
Performance of the song 'Sennen no Inori' by Amane Kanata and AZKi.

subtitles.original: ...浮かす
subtitles.english: ...lifting

subtitles.original: 切ない記憶
subtitles.english: Painful memories

subtitles.original: 色褪せてく現実に揺れる
subtitles.english: Swaying in a fading reality

subtitles.original: 絶望には負けたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to lose to despair

subtitles.original: 私が今私であること
subtitles.english: That I am who I am right now

subtitles.original: 胸を張って
subtitles.english: Holding my head high

subtitles.original: 全て誇れる！
subtitles.english: I can be proud of everything!

subtitles.original: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search my way
subtitles.english: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search my way

subtitles.original: Only my Railgun can shoot it 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Only my Railgun can shoot it, right now

subtitles.original: 身体中を光の速さで
subtitles.english: Throughout my body at the speed of light

subtitles.original: 駆け巡った確かな予感
subtitles.english: A certain premonition raced through

subtitles.original: 放て！心に刻んだ夢を
subtitles.english: Release it! The dream carved into my heart

subtitles.original: 未来さえ置き去りにして
subtitles.english: Leaving even the future behind

subtitles.original: 限界など知らない 意味無い
subtitles.english: I don't know limits, they're meaningless

subtitles.original: この力が光散らす
subtitles.english: This power scatters light

subtitles.original: その先
subtitles.english: And beyond that

subtitles.original: 遥かな想いを！
subtitles.english: My distant feelings!

subtitles.original: 素晴らしき世界に今日も乾杯
subtitles.english: Cheers to this wonderful world again today

subtitles.original: 街に飛び交う笑い声も
subtitles.english: Even the laughter echoing through the city

subtitles.original: 見て見ぬフリしてるだけの作りもんさ
subtitles.english: Is just a fabrication that everyone ignores

subtitles.original: 気が触れそうだ
subtitles.english: It's enough to drive me mad

subtitles.original: クラクラするほどの良い匂いが
subtitles.english: A scent so good it makes me dizzy

subtitles.original: ツンと刺した鼻の奥 目を覚ます
subtitles.english: Pierces deep into my nose and wakes me up

subtitles.original: 本能のまま今日は誰の番だ
subtitles.english: Following instinct, whose turn is it today?

subtitles.original: この世界で
subtitles.english: In this world

subtitles.original: 何かができるのか 僕には
subtitles.english: What can I do? For me...

subtitles.original: 何ができるのか
subtitles.english: ...what can I do?

subtitles.original: ただその真っ黒な目から
subtitles.english: I just don't want tears to fall...

subtitles.original: 涙こぼれ落ちないように
subtitles.english: ...from those pitch-black eyes

subtitles.original: 願う 未来に何度でもずっと
subtitles.english: I pray, forever and ever into the future

subtitles.original: 喰らいつく
subtitles.english: I'll keep hanging on

subtitles.original: この間違いだらけの世界の中
subtitles.english: Inside this world full of mistakes

subtitles.original: 君には笑ってほしいから
subtitles.english: I want you to be able to smile

subtitles.original: もう誰も傷つけない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get hurt anymore

subtitles.original: 強く強くなりたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I want to become strong, so strong

subtitles.original: 僕が僕でいられるように
subtitles.english: So that I can remain myself

subtitles.original: 素晴らしき世界は今日も安泰
subtitles.english: This wonderful world is peaceful again today

subtitles.original: 街に渦巻く悪い話も
subtitles.english: Even the bad rumors swirling in the city

subtitles.original: 知らない知らないフリして目を逸らした
subtitles.english: I looked away, pretending I didn't know

subtitles.original: 正気の沙汰じゃないな
subtitles.english: This is sheer madness

subtitles.original: 真面目に着飾った行進
subtitles.english: A march dressed up in sincerity

subtitles.original: 鳴らす足音が弾む 行き先は
subtitles.english: The sound of footsteps bounces, the destination...

subtitles.original: 消えない消えない味が染み付いている
subtitles.english: ...is stained with an indelible taste

subtitles.original: 裏側の世界
subtitles.english: The world on the other side

subtitles.original: 今日も答えのない世界の中で願ってるんだよ
subtitles.english: In this world without answers, I'm praying today too

subtitles.original: 不器用だけれど
subtitles.english: Clumsy as I am

subtitles.original: いつまでも君とただ笑っていたいから
subtitles.english: Because I just want to laugh with you forever

subtitles.original: 跳ねる心臓が体揺らし
subtitles.english: My pounding heart shakes my body

subtitles.original: 叫ぶんだよ
subtitles.english: And it's screaming

subtitles.original: 今こそ動き出せ
subtitles.english: Now is the time to start moving

subtitles.original: 弱い自分を何度でもずっと
subtitles.english: Over and over again, my weak self...

subtitles.original: 喰らいつく
subtitles.english: ...will keep hanging on

subtitles.original: この間違いだらけの世界の中
subtitles.english: Inside this world full of mistakes

subtitles.original: 君には笑ってほしいから
subtitles.english: I want you to be able to smile

subtitles.original: もう誰も泣かないよう
subtitles.english: So that no one has to cry anymore

subtitles.original: 強く強くなりたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I want to become strong, so strong

subtitles.original: 僕が僕でいられるように
subtitles.english: So that I can remain myself

subtitles.original: ただ君を守るそのために
subtitles.english: Just for the sake of protecting you

subtitles.original: 走る 走る 走るんだよ
subtitles.english: I'll run, run, run

subtitles.original: 僕の中の僕を超える
subtitles.english: To surpass the me inside of me

subtitles.original: まるで御伽の話
subtitles.english: Just like a fairy tale

subtitles.original: 終わり迎えた証
subtitles.english: A sign that it's come to an end

subtitles.original: 長すぎる旅路から
subtitles.english: From a journey that was far too long

subtitles.original: 切り出した一節
subtitles.english: A passage cut out
